docs.snippet: Information from Rockville shows that portions of the New-York Ninth, Pennsylvania First, and New-Hampshire Regimens, together with the President's mounted guard, and a part of Col. MAGRUDER'S battery, yesterday made an advance movement from that...
docs.lead_paragraph: Information from Rockville shows that portions of the New-York Ninth, Pennsylvania First, and New-Hampshire Regimens, together with the President's mounted guard, and a part of Col. MAGRUDER'S battery, yesterday made an advance movement from that town. It was expected in camp that two additional regiments from Washington would immediately join the forces under Col. STONE.

headline.main: An Error in Regard to Ex-Gov. Ross Corrected.

docs.snippet: We came to anchor here at 4 P.M., fifty-six hours from Key West, Since we have been away from here nothing has transpired of importance. The Supply was relieved by the Release, twenty-four days from New-York. Ths Philadelphia has kept the fort and...
docs.lead_paragraph: We came to anchor here at 4 P.M., fifty-six hours from Key West, Since we have been away from here nothing has transpired of importance. The Supply was relieved by the Release, twenty-four days from New-York. Ths Philadelphia has kept the fort and fleet supplied with fresh beef, and the rebels are still afraid to fire that first gun.

headline.main: FROM CAIRO.; ANXIETY FOR A FORWARD MOVEMENT KENTUCKLANS ASKING PROTECTION ARRIVAL OF THE NURSES THE NUMBER ON THE SICK LIST. PADUCAH ASKS PROTECTION. ARRIVAL OF THE NURSE CORPS. HOSPITAL REPORT.

FROM CAIRO.; ANXIETY FOR A FORWARD MOVEMENT KENTUCKIANS ASKING PROTECTION ARRIVAL OF THENURSES THE NUMBER ON THE SICK LIST. PADUCAH ASKS PROTECTION. ARRIVAL OF THE NURSE CORPS. HOSPITAL REPORT. THOMAS LINN, Surgeon.

headline.main: GOSSIP FROM BOHEMIA.; Toplitz as a Watering-Place The Baths The Surroundings of the Town The Currency.

docs.lead_paragraph: Of all the watering-places of Germany, Toplitz stands in the first rank. It is next to Carlsbad, the favorite resort of the Austrians; and loses nothing, in my opinion, by being so far removed from the fashionable routes of travel as to be comparatively free from English and French tourists:

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: This has been an exciting and sorrowful day at Old Point Comfort. Gen. BUTLER having learned that the rebels were forming an intrenched camp with strong batteries at Great Bethel, nine miles from Hampton, on the Yorktown Road, he deemed it necessary...

headline.main: OTHER ACCOUNTS.; FORTRESS MONROE, Monday, June 10, via. BALTIMORE. Tuesday, June 11.

docs.lead_paragraph: This has been an exciting and sorrowful day at Old Point Comfort. Gen. BUTLER having learned that the rebels were forming an intrenched camp with strong batteries at Great Bethel, nine miles from Hampton, on the Yorktown Road, he deemed it necessary to dislodge them; accordingly movements were made last night from Fortress Monroe and Newport News.

docs.snippet: At the meeting of the Common Council, last evening, Alderman STRONG read the following dispatch received by Brig.-Gen. CROOKE. It was loudly applauded by the Aldermen and lobby:
